actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The treant makes two attacks  or makes one attack and uses Animate Plant.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 20 (4d6 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Rock
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, range 60/180 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (2d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Animate Plant
actions.desc: The treant magically animates a Large or larger plant within 60 feet. The plant is immobile  but it acts on the treants initiative and can make slam attacks  or rock attacks if there are rocks to throw within 10 feet of it. Non-plant creatures treat the ground within 15 feet of the plant as difficult terrain  as surrounding roots conspire to trip and grasp moving creatures. The plant remains animated for 1 hour. If the treant uses this action while it has three plants animated in this way  the plant that has been animated the longest returns to normal.

special_abilities.name: False Appearance
special_abilities.desc: While motionless, the treant is indistinguishable from a tree.

special_abilities.name: Flammable
special_abilities.desc: If the treant takes fire damage, it catches fire, taking 10 (3d6) ongoing fire damage, unless it is already on fire. It can use an action to extinguish itself, ending the ongoing damage.

special_abilities.name: Forest Speaker
special_abilities.desc: The treant can communicate with beasts and plants.

special_abilities.name: Siege Monster
special_abilities.desc: The treant deals double damage to objects and structures.
